io.github.izdwuut.yarl.model.systems

Class LevelingSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.ashley.core.EntitySystem
      • com.badlogic.ashley.systems.IteratingSystem
        • io.github.izdwuut.yarl.model.systems.LevelingSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Listenable<Event>

    public class LevelingSystem
extends com.badlogic.ashley.systems.IteratingSystem
implements Listenable<Event>
    A leveling system. It handles gaining experience points and leveling to higher experience levels. It process Exp entities that are added to an entity engine by a CombatSystem. In future it might be possible to gain experience for other activities than killing monsters.
    Since:
    2018-01-15
    Author:
    Bartosz "izdwuut" Konikiewicz

        public int getBreakpoint(int lvl)
